metadata.name: The origin behind the legend: The banana tattooer
metadata.description:
Epüçåsode  #1

ORIGIN BEHIND THE LEGEND: THE BANANA TATTOOER.

When years ago he first began covering his body with tattoos, the people around him shook their heads and told him he was too young, too immature to make such a permanent decision.

"You're not mature enough for tattoos" they said. 

But instead of getting discouraged, he found inspiration in their words and came up with a brilliant idea.

He began to envision the bananas as living beings, each one waiting for someone to tattoo their stains the moment they became mature. 
With a sense of excitement and adventure, he opened his own Banana Tattoo shop. 
And soon enough, his first client arrived.
